title: Edison's Inventions
description: Throughout his life, Thomas Edison created over one thousand inventions, some of which are still used today. Edison's Inventions introduces students to some of Edison's most famous inventions and explains why he is an important figure in history. The book can also be used to teach students how to determine an author's purpose and to effectively ask and answer questions.
meta: batteries, electric, inventor, machine, phonograph, telegraph
